Package gameLogic

Class LevelGenerator

java.lang.Object
gameLogic.LevelGenerator
public class LevelGenerator
extends Object
Level Generator is a class that uses Depth-first search algorithm to auto generate a maze. To make the game playable, we randomly deleted walls to make more room for the player. this class provides a getter for the generated maze.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(LevelGenerator.Difficulty choice)
      Set the Difficulty of the game. The harder the game, the more walls the game have.
      Parameters:
      choice - The chosen Difficulty (EASY, MEDIUM, HARD).

    • isWall

      public boolean isWall​(int x, int y)
      Check whether that position consists a wall
      Parameters:
      x - An integer for the x position
      y - An integer for the y position
      Returns:
      true if that position contains a wall and vise versa.
